p: Methanol, formic acid, water for LC/MS analysis and acetonitrile were all purchased from CNW Technologies GmbH (DÃ¼sseldorf, Germany). Lmurine-2-chlorophenylalanine was obtained from Shanghai Hengchuang Bio-technology Co., Ltd. (Shanghai, China). LysoPC17: 0 was purchased from Avanti Company of the United States, and all of the chemicals and solvents were analytical or HPLC grade.
